Whether you want a single sleeper, full size, queen, or even king-size, the Monika sleeper sofa collection has it all. Ascetically pleasing to a large audience, Monika is a go-to product for its ability to conform to any environment.

Getting its name by how the dual motion sleeper nests a portion of the mattress perfectly below the seat and tucking another portion effortlessly in the back of the frame. A combination that does not compromise on style or comfort whether seated or sleeping. See Luonto Monika King sleeper sofa with Walnut finish wood leg. Modern Luonto Monika collection is available in Fun 496, Loule 630, Oliver 173, Oliver 515. Dual motion sleeper for ease of use.

A focus on Scandinavian design and quality with an emphasis on functionality. Scandinavian design was a movement from the 1950s based on simplicity, minimalism, and functionality. A style that allows our design team to be flexible while staying on target and true to our roots. True to form, our furniture has the simple, clean lines you would expect and it is full of function! Whether you need the perfect sleeper sofa, additional storage, adjustable seating comfort, or more, we have solutions with style. Never one to compromise comfort, we take great pride in building our furniture for everyday use while incorporating functions that can make your life easier.

Luonto uses a combination of state-of-the-art technology and the expertise of their craftsmen to produce a sustainable, beautiful, and functional product. Based in Finland, Luonto's manufacturing processes are part of the family business's heritage. ""This is not something we do to be on-trend but rather it is done simply because it is where we come from and how we do things."" Luonto only uses locally sourced wood and recycles its wood waste by converting it into pellets that heat all three production lines, local schools, and even one local town. ""With these methods and more we have a minimal footprint in making our product while helping others that can benefit from our byproducts.

This Italian designed and manufactured sofa sleeper combines beauty and functionality into one beautiful piece. Discover modern and contemporary luxury sofa bed offering incredible comfort and versatility. Digiò Leather Sofas is an authorized manufacturer for Kathy Ireland and proudly presents Kathy Ireland Collection.

Digio Sofabeds are made with open mattress frame which are efficient and as the name suggests, especially easy to use. The key benefit to the Easy Open Sofabed Mechanism is that you don’t even have to remove the cushions. The cushions are attached to the sofa and stay there when you open or close the bed. No fussing with displaced couch cushions!

You can convert from sofa to bed in less than ten seconds. To open the bed, just pull forward at the top of the back cushion. The bed practically unfolds by itself. Just one simple motion and you’re done. This “one-move” configuration is pretty unique. It’s sophisticated, too, because you get ease of use, comfort, and durability all in one thanks to this opening mechanism.

Manufactured in Italy from a world-renowned sofa bed mechanism manufacturer, the frame is durable but also designed for your comfort. Our easy open beds are intended to be everyday sleepers. We ensure that you receive the same quality of a traditional mattress. How, do we do this? The frame has wood support slats like a traditional bed. And, like all our mattresses, you receive 5"" thick Memory Foam mattress to last a lifetime.

Digiò Leather is a brand whose value comes from the experience and the expertise of 26 years of business. Our focus is on materials, innovation and style to make remarkable frames with affordable prices. Established in the south of Italy and extremely tied to the handmade tradition, this brand is the portrayal of important work values and care of customers requests.

It’s important for us to give the best product to our customers, therefore we use only materials made in Italy processed in our factory. Each frame is characterized by aesthetic balance and contemporary design which grant exceptional comfort.

We are continuously striving to improve ourselves and our products, we pay attention to the new technologies, to the research and development in order to achieve our aim: to get a product with  a unique design and let the customers find out what they are looking for.

To keep your leather seating looking its best, avoid placing it in direct sunlight or near a heat source. Rub out minor scratches lightly with a finger. For oil-based spots and spills, wipe up any excess with a clean, dry cloth. Do not apply water. Rather, leave the spot alone: In most cases the spot should dissipate into the leather after a period of time.
